sub_title: I use the power of music and play to motivate communities to develop and individuals to learn & grow
summary:
I am an experienced Musician / Music educator / Facilitator / Trainer / Online Education and Learning Consultant. I do my best at addressing some of the world's challenges through music performing, education and advisory for entrepreneurs and organizations in the fields of the arts, education, culture and social impact when it comes to project conception and development. 

I focus on and support social strengthening of at-risk communities and children with refugee status. The experience I gained from working, studying and researching in Colombia, Norway, Germany, and now The Netherlands, have made me focus on creating a positive impact on people's life's through the communication and team dynamics found in music.

With trainings for music educators and music workshops for young people but also adults and professional teams, I explore concepts like intercultural and cross-cultural communication, diversity, inclusion, peace and solidarity, belonging, resilience, democracy and community building.

It's always hard to explain with words what I do, so just look at the videos down here 👇

Check out my website
www.juandavidgarzon.com
treasury_media: [{'url': 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ppNSa07KG-g', 'title': 'On The Spot: A Space for Community Collective Music Creation', 'description': 'Together with Kirsten Gerritsen, Anan AL-Kadamani and Pim van der Mijl we are developing a space to share experiences and talents through music. Diffusing the line that divides musicians from audience, trained musicians and non-musicians concert hall and community space and many other opposites. We want to turn around how the traditional jam session works and create an environment where the multiculturally richness of the city of Utrecht blends with its people!', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C4E27AQE5jUH7RkCX4A/articleshare-shrink_800/0/1690968687346?e=1692954000&v=beta&t=elHpJWLlOqgt8wLtjmz7hd-jePCqOuMs6OvRh7zeP7E'}, {'url': 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hz_bxkl6r04', 'title': 'Building Belonging Through the Recognition of the Other @ The Hague University of Applied Sciences', 'description': '"Building Belonging Through the Recognition of the Other" was the name I gave to the workshop I was invited to give to the 1st year students of social work of The Hague University of Applied Sciences. \n\n\u200bThe workshop had as a goal, to show the students how integrating music in their practice can create a big impact on communities and on the social worker. I have presented, given workshops and supported organizations in central and south America as well as in Europe. During the Covid-19 crisis I have focused my work with institutions and individuals on how to transition to a remote work using the internet as a way of creating connection and staying strong as a community. 

I currently lecture on the subject at the Javeriana University of Bogotá and the Universidad del Norte of Barranquilla

Some of my clients are: 
- The Latin-America Forum of Musical Education 
- The University of Agder
- Musicians Without Borders
- Javeriana University, Music Department Teacher Staff
- Tontalente e.V. 
- Next Generation Stage School
- Filarmonica Joven de Colombia
- All Stars Project London
- Gimnasio Campestre', 'title': 'Online Learning & Teaching Consultant', 'employment_type': 'Self-employed'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Self-Employed', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Working on a global basis ', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Self-Employed', 'description': 'As a socially engaged artist, I have devoted myself to facilitate social change through the arts, sound and play. I want to help others to connect with their own self, the others and their communities using the power of music and the arts, through their communicative and team dynamics. I have experience working with communities that undergo significant stress because of refuge seeking, cultural clash, extreme poverty and social injustice.

Some of the organizations I work with: 
* Tontalente e.V. - Germany
* Play Perform Learn Grow - Greece
* De Voorkamer - The Netherlands

At the same time I use these same methods to help teams and organizations to strengthen bonds and deepen in their communication and work capacities through workshops and mid term trainings using music, sound and play.', 'title': 'Community / Team Development Facilitator & Trainer Through Sound and Play', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 33200573, 'name': 'Self Employed', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQH3nUDO57s78A/company-logo_400_400/0/1531936161449?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=PQMfjrSNhH4rOl7J9-sgEsSGiyxG1iQxorfxmXNKNHs', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/indpendent-contractor/', 'employees': {'start': 0, 'end': 1}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Working on a global basis', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Self Employed', 'description': 'I help other professionals and artists to focus and follow through with social, entrepreneurship projects and startups. • Provided personal guidance to integrate and include refugee children into the German society through music.
• Developed the children music program and curriculum.
• Expanded the reach of the Kids District Orchestra Eichholz as musical Conductor / Director,
• Established communication channels with schools, teachers, social workers, parents and cooperation partners.
• Built and strengthened an event department.

As a music educator I led groups at 3 different schools where many refugee children start their first classes in the German school system. There we worked with inclusion and integration into their new environment through music projects that puts them together with children raised in Germany. Through songs, both from the German Pop repertoire and self composed, the children got a new approach towards this new language. Having to communicate with each other to solve different musical situations like when they are learning their instrument parts in smaller groups, have proved to give these students a set of skills that they would not achieve so fast by other means. From projects like the Lebenskünstler, a couple of students have discovered their passion for music and have decided to seek a semi-professional career.

I provided training in music pedagogics and counselling for the teachers of the different projects and established communication paths between students-teachers-schools-parents and cooperation partners. 

I conducted, directed and wrote for The Children District Orchestra Eichholz in Lübeck which is an integration project with the goal to provide a space where kids can interact in a productive way, towards a common objective, despite their differences in social, cultural and language background. 

There, I also did the event management for Tontalente. This involved the planning, conduction and assessment of the organization’s events.', 'title': 'Youth Programs Director / Music Educator / Project Development / Event Management', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 12460269, 'name': 'RockPop-Schule Lübeck', 'logo': None, 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/rockpop-schule-l%C3%BCbeck/', 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Lübeck Area, Germany', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'RockPop-Schule Lübeck', 'description': 'Conductor for Children Rock-Pop Choir "Rock Pop Kids" for ages 6-14', 'title': 'Choir Director', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Sticks School of Music', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Lübeck Area, Germany', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Sticks School of Music', 'description': 'Teacher for E-Bass, Guitar, Keyboard, Singing Coaching', 'title': 'Music Teacher', 'employment_type': None}]}]

PPLG will bring together educators and researchers, therapists, social scientists, artists, psychologists and movement practitioners, social and youth workers, performance activists and community organizers – refugees, migrants and locals, and all others who are seeking new, and often performatory, ways to address the pain, alienation, and violence of our times.
